I have just created a Gann group - if anyone else is interested let me know and I will invite you to join. I'm not trying to keep anyone out just keep track of whose watching - hedge funds not allowed - .  The idea is to talk and compare Gann.  This site seems to work pretty much like HC with the ability to have different threads on different topics the difference being that there is no big brother in control.

Ooops hit the submit button accidentally.  Anyway the point of a Gann group is simply to separate the Gann stuff from the rest.  Twitter is useful but I am finding that there are just so many posts I can't keep up with the stuff which I am interested in and find useful. No offence to anyone - lots of the other stuff is of great quality and often amusing - think Alan McG but just not helpful to my own style of trading.
